default: Ptulae recubans sub tegmine fagi dolor.
help_text: This is the heading input field for the form. Write the heading and it updates the heading on the top of the form as well.
inline_help_text: This is the heading input field for the form.
label: Heading
name: heading

help_text: This toggle feature is used to include and exclude the name input field in the form.
inline_help_text: By checking this, the name input field will be included in the form every time.
label: Include name field
name: include_name_field

label: Unique Email
name: unique_email
help_text: By turning this toggle switch ON, the user has to enter an email that is unique or doesn't exist in the system before.
inline_help_text: Turn this ON to check the existence of email in the system.
